welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Heikendorf, Germany! Known for its picturesque views and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiel-Holtenau Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rendsburg Schachtholm Airport serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schleswig-jagel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
